title: Cozy Floors & Christmas Cheer: My DuraDecor Collection + A Giveaway!
description: You know how much I love creating warm, cozy spaces that feel like home. That’s why curating my very own flooring line with DuraDecor has been such a dream come true. From the soft wood tones to the durable materials, this collection was designed with coziness and practicality in mind. Having this cozy flooring line […]
author: Jose Galvan
excerpt: You know how much I love creating warm, cozy spaces that feel like home. That’s why curating my very own flooring line with DuraDecor has been such a dream come true. From the soft wood tones to the durable materials, this collection was designed with coziness and practicality in mind. Having this cozy flooring line […]
text: You know how much I love creating warm, cozy spaces that feel like home. That’s why curating my very own flooring line with DuraDecor has been such a dream come true. From the soft wood tones to the durable materials, this collection was designed with coziness and practicality in mind. Having this cozy flooring line in so many of your homes truly means the world to me. It’s been such an honor to see how you’ve brought these designs to life, and I can’t thank you enough for sharing your spaces with me!As a special thank-you this holiday season, I’ve teamed up with DuraDecor to host a Christmas sweepstakes to gift back to YOU! Five lucky winners will receive a $500 Home Depot gift card. To enter, all you have to do is answer a few questions here. But that’s not all—there are three bonus entry opportunities:Visit the Liz Marie by Door Décor page on the DuraDecor website. Refer a friend to enter the contest. Share about the sweepstakes on Instagram.The contest officially starts November 11th at 12 a.m. EST, so mark your calendars and don’t miss your chance! You can see all the giveaway details [HERE]Seeing My Floors in Your HomesI’ve been overwhelmed by the love and creativity you’ve shared while using my flooring collection in your spaces. It’s such a joy to see how these floors complement so many different styles, from cozy cottages to modern homes, and everything in between. I’m constantly inspired by how you make each room uniquely yours, proving that these floors can truly shine in any environment. We are loving how @stefmturner space turned out!Testimonials Across Styles: See the VarietyHere are a few other beautiful spaces from Kelsey Mackall of A.Dabbled.Dwelling and Tracey Baggett of RemingtonDesignCo that showcase how versatile and stunning the flooring can be. Their kind words about how the flooring has transformed their homes are a testament to its ability to blend seamlessly into any design style. I’m so grateful to see how much joy these floors bring to your spaces!Kelsey Mackall of A.Dabbled.Dwelling chose the Bungalow Beige flooring for her 70s-style home:“I chose Bungalow Beige because of its warm blonde tone and soft wood grain. I think lighter-colored floors actually hide more dirt than darker ones, contrary to popular belief. My home has low ceilings and minimal light, so I wanted something to brighten the space. My favorite part about this product is its durability! I don’t have to stress over spills, ride-on toys, or DIY project messes. Plus, tackling the installation myself was so empowering!”Tracey Baggett of RemingtonDesignCo selected Sand Tropez for her family cottage:“I wanted a lighter wood tone with a cottagey feel and loved the look of the knots and texture in Sand Tropez. Taking on the flooring project myself boosted my confidence—it was so rewarding to see it come to life!”Hearing how much you love the collection fills me with so much joy. Whether you’ve selected a warm blonde hue or a cozy cottage-inspired wood grain, I love seeing how these floors add a touch of warmth and charm to your homes.Don’t Miss Your Chance to Enter!If you’ve been dreaming of a cozy flooring update—or just want a little extra holiday cheer—be sure to enter the sweepstakes here. It’s quick, easy, and full of holiday fun! And don’t forget to snag those bonus entries by exploring the collection, referring a friend, or sharing your excitement on Instagram.Thank you again for welcoming my DuraDecor flooring collection into your homes. It’s been such a blessing to see how you’re making your spaces cozier than ever.Stay Cozy!Liz Marie
html:
You know how much I love creating warm, cozy spaces that feel like home. That’s why curating my very own flooring line with DuraDecor has been such a dream come true. From the soft wood tones to the durable materials, this collection was designed with coziness and practicality in mind. Having this cozy flooring line in so many of your homes truly means the world to me. It’s been such an honor to see how you’ve brought these designs to life, and I can’t thank you enough for sharing your spaces with me!

As a special thank-you this holiday season, I’ve teamed up with DuraDecor to host a Christmas sweepstakes to gift back to YOU! Five lucky winners will receive a $500 Home Depot gift card. To enter, all you have to do is answer a few questions here. But that’s not all—there are three bonus entry opportunities:

  • Visit the Liz Marie by Door Décor page on the DuraDecor website.
  • Refer a friend to enter the contest.
  • Share about the sweepstakes on Instagram.

The contest officially starts November 11th at 12 a.m. EST, so mark your calendars and don’t miss your chance! You can see all the giveaway details [HERE]

Seeing My Floors in Your Homes

I’ve been overwhelmed by the love and creativity you’ve shared while using my flooring collection in your spaces. It’s such a joy to see how these floors complement so many different styles, from cozy cottages to modern homes, and everything in between. I’m constantly inspired by how you make each room uniquely yours, proving that these floors can truly shine in any environment. We are loving how @stefmturner space turned out!

Testimonials Across Styles: See the Variety

Here are a few other beautiful spaces from Kelsey Mackall of A.Dabbled.Dwelling and Tracey Baggett of RemingtonDesignCo that showcase how versatile and stunning the flooring can be. Their kind words about how the flooring has transformed their homes are a testament to its ability to blend seamlessly into any design style. I’m so grateful to see how much joy these floors bring to your spaces!

Kelsey Mackall of A.Dabbled.Dwelling chose the Bungalow Beige flooring for her 70s-style home:
“I chose Bungalow Beige because of its warm blonde tone and soft wood grain. I think lighter-colored floors actually hide more dirt than darker ones, contrary to popular belief. My home has low ceilings and minimal light, so I wanted something to brighten the space. My favorite part about this product is its durability! I don’t have to stress over spills, ride-on toys, or DIY project messes. Plus, tackling the installation myself was so empowering!”

Tracey Baggett of RemingtonDesignCo selected Sand Tropez for her family cottage:
“I wanted a lighter wood tone with a cottagey feel and loved the look of the knots and texture in Sand Tropez. Taking on the flooring project myself boosted my confidence—it was so rewarding to see it come to life!”

Hearing how much you love the collection fills me with so much joy. Whether you’ve selected a warm blonde hue or a cozy cottage-inspired wood grain, I love seeing how these floors add a touch of warmth and charm to your homes.

Don’t Miss Your Chance to Enter!

If you’ve been dreaming of a cozy flooring update—or just want a little extra holiday cheer—be sure to enter the sweepstakes here. It’s quick, easy, and full of holiday fun! And don’t forget to snag those bonus entries by exploring the collection, referring a friend, or sharing your excitement on Instagram.

Thank you again for welcoming my DuraDecor flooring collection into your homes. It’s been such a blessing to see how you’re making your spaces cozier than ever.

Stay Cozy!
Liz Marie
